MAN.TITLE: save_graph

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : string, the path of the graph to save

DESCRIPTION.P: save_graph saves the graph g in a graph file. path is the name of the graph file where the graph will be saved. path can be the name or the pathname of the file; if the "graph" extension is missing in path, it is assumed. If path is the name of a directory, the name of the graph is used as the name of the file.
